casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 1, 2008

[Cite as 0510112008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-2027.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0703. Kelly v. May Assoc. Fed. Credit Union.

Summit App. No. 23423, 2008-0hio-1507. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for immediate stay of the lower court decisions,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.

Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
